”Tage and Astrid were two soul mates…
data.text:
Humans have been on a suidal path for 50 years. I believe the only thing that MIGHT save us is a shift in consciousness. From having ego as the operating system to putting our heart and soul in the drivers seat. It´s sounds complicated, but all it requires is WILLINGNESS. Take a look INSIDE: How WILLING are you to try a NEW approach to life, work, leader- and followership? Book a free consultation if you want to explore.

Anyone else love The Greatest Showman? That soundtrack goes hard. But then again, I'm a sucker for a good musical. I'm also a sucker for a great read. When I saw a book titled "Barnum" - I had to check it out. It was quite a surprise to me that Barnum's life looked a lot different from the movie. Diving into the world of P.T. Barnum through Robert Wilson's book has been an absolute delight. He was a man driven by boundless energy, and unwavering optimism. Wilson captures Barnum's resilience, especially during moments of crisis. His ability to remain cool-headed amidst chaos was nothing short of remarkable. What struck me most was the multifaceted nature of Barnum. While some paint him with a single brushstroke, his story reveals a more nuanced portrait. You've likely heard the famous Barnum quote, "there's a sucker born every minute". Only, there is no evidence that he ever spoke it. He certainly never wrote it. Barnum lived with a zest for life, great humor, and the ability to navigate the peaks and valleys. Barnum's story is a life well-lived, filled with lessons, adventures, and a spirit worth emulating. He faced challenges, even enduring injustice for his beliefs, yet he held firm. To raise awareness of the corrupt legal system, he voluntarily went to prison instead of paying bail. Barnum's life wasn't without controversy or setbacks. In an era of quick judgments, it's essential to appreciate the depth of historical figures. Barnum's tale isn't just a spectacle; it's a narrative of resilience, innovation, and a celebration of embracing life in all its forms. This book has been a reminder that amidst historical criticism, there's a wealth of lessons and inspiration waiting to be discovered. #Books #BookReflections #Reading #Resilience

Shakespeare's First Folios: now on display in a high-tech Fort Knox. The Folger Shakespeare Library's newly unveiled vault is a dazzling spectacle, housing a collection of First Folios that's both priceless and, well, pricey. With security measures that would make Nicholas Cage sweat, this glass fortress is a testament to the library's commitment to both preservation and accessibility. Visitors can now marvel at the sheer magnitude of Henry Clay Folger's obsession, as rows upon rows of illuminated folios stand proudly on display. It's a sight that would make any literary enthusiast weak at the knees, and a reminder that even in the digital age, the power of the printed word remains undeniable. So, whether you're a Shakespeare scholar or simply curious about these literary treasures, the Folger's new vault is a must-see. Just don't ask about the security details – some secrets are best left buried (or, in this case, behind bulletproof glass). #FolgerShakespeareLibrary #FirstFolios #LiteraryTreasures #VaultGoals

In case you missed it... Renowned author Richard Rudd returns to the Think Tank in response to popular demand to continue and expand on the topics they had left off on. To open the discussion into new areas, they are joined by Alan Green, a celebrated pianist, composer, author, and Shakespeare scholar. This captivating episode delves into the hidden secrets of the Freemasons intertwined with Cleopatra’s Needle, shedding light on the mysterious inspirations behind Shakespeare’s timeless works. Alan discloses his discovery of encryptions within the Declaration of Independence, the Bill of Rights, and the Constitution’s preamble. Exploring profound concepts like spiritual nihilism, the hero’s journey, and infinite beginnings, they unlock the limitless potential within each individual. Prepare for a mind-expanding experience as they unravel Shakespeare’s enigmatic identity and decode the veiled symbolism across languages. Together, they unveil covert codes concealed within Shakespeare’s masterpieces, illuminating a deep understanding of the human experience and tapping into the depths of collective consciousness. Don’t miss this extraordinary conversation, where ancient mysteries converge with modern wisdom, forever altering your perception of the world.
